alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 23 at 3:17PM PST until February 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...Sonoma Coastal Range, North Bay Interior Mountains and North Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will be hazardous to unsheltered or marginally sheltered populations, kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect people, pets, and tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range
